sentences.english: Serpentinite is the least altered member of the peridotite suite .
sentences.chinese: 蛇紋岩是橄欖岩組蝕變最輕微的分子。

sentences.english: This may be up to 50km thick and comprises ultrabasic peridotite .
sentences.chinese: 其厚度可達50公里並由超基性的橄欖岩所組成。

sentences.english: The ores exist mainly as peridotite inclusion.
sentences.chinese: 礦石主要爲橄欖岩包體。

sentences.english: The magnesite originated from the peridotite by weathering.
sentences.chinese: 菱鎂礦是由橄欖岩風化形成的。

sentences.english: Serpentinite is the least altered member of the peridotite suite.
sentences.chinese: 蛇紋岩是橄欖岩組蝕變最輕微的分子。

sentences.english: Below the lithosphere is the rheosphere comprising partly fused peridotite .
sentences.chinese: 岩石圈之下是由部分熔融的橄欖岩所組成的軟流圈。

sentences.english: The mantle xenoliths are dominated by spinel lherzolite.
sentences.chinese: 包體類型主要爲尖晶石二輝橄欖岩。
